coll-book_creator_intro: <big>Plus de ''book creator'' you fi create book wey dey contain wiki pages for your choice. You fi export de book for different formats inside (for example PDF or ODF) or order printed copy.</big>
coll-book_creator_help: Spy [[{{MediaWiki:Coll-helppage}}|de help page sake of books]] for more info.
coll-book_creator_disable_text: Dem go disable ''Book creator'' den dem go remove de book wey you dey job for top.
coll-unknown_subpage_text: Dis subpage for [[Special:Book|Book]] no dey exist
coll-couldnotaddarticle_msg: Dem no fi add de wiki page.
coll-couldnotremovearticle_title: Dem no fi comot wiki page
coll-couldnotremovearticle_msg: Dem no fi comot de wiki page.
coll-download_text: To download your book make you choose format den click de button.
coll-download_as_text: To download your book for $1 inside format click de button.
coll-drag_and_drop: Use drag & drop to reorder wiki pages den chapters
coll-notitle_msg: Dem no fi determine de title for de page.
coll-request_failed_msg: Na error dey while dem attempt to render your book.
coll-save_collection_text: Choose storage location give your book:
coll-save_category: Dem go add all saved books go de category [[:Category:{{MediaWiki:Coll-bookscategory}}|{{MediaWiki:Coll-bookscategory}}]].
coll-overwrite_text:
Page plus de name [[:$1]] dey exist already.
You want say make dem replace am plus your book?
coll-load_overwrite_text:
You get sum pages for your book inside already.
You want make dem overwrite your current book, append de fresh content, or cancel dey load dis book?
coll-limit_exceeded_text:
Your book bola too much.
Dem no fi add more pages.
coll-rendering_text:
We beg wedge while dem dey generate de document.

Progress: $1% $2

Dis page for automatically refresh every few seconds. If dis no dey job, we beg make you press your browser hin refresh button.
coll-rendering_finished_text: Dem generate de document file. [$1 Download de file] for your computer top.
